           issue<h3 class="medium-heading"><!----> issue</h3>
          
            Target project:<label for="targetProjectInput">Target project:</label>
            
              <input id="targetProjectInput" aria-owns="chops-autocomplete-1" aria-autocomplete="both" aria-expanded="false" aria-haspopup="listbox" aria-activedescendant="">
              
      
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;
        }

        for LitElement.

      </dialog>
    
        Email display settings<h2>Email display settings</h2>

        There is a setting<a href="/hosting/settings">setting</a> to control how
        your email address appears on comments and issues that you post.<p>There is a <a href="/hosting/settings">setting</a> to control how
        your email address appears on comments and issues that you post.</p>

        Project members will always see your full email address.  By
        default, other users who visit the site will see an
        abbreviated version of your email address.<p>Project members will always see your full email address.  By
        default, other users who visit the site will see an
        abbreviated version of your email address.</p>

        If you do not wish your email address to be shared, there
        are other ways to get
        involved<a href="http://www.chromium.org/getting-involved">get
        involved</a> in the community.  To report a problem when using
        the Chrome browser, you may use the "Report an issue..."  item
        on the "Help" menu.<p>If you do not wish your email address to be shared, there
        are other ways to <a href="http://www.chromium.org/getting-involved">get
        involved</a> in the community.  To report a problem when using
        the Chrome browser, you may use the "Report an issue..."  item
        on the "Help" menu.</p>


        
          
      
        <slot></slot>
      <button>
        <slot></slot>
      </button>
    
            Got it
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        <div class="edit-actions">
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        </div>
      <chops-dialog id="privacyDialog" forced="">
        <h2>Email display settings</h2>

        <p>There is a <a href="/hosting/settings">setting</a> to control how
        your email address appears on comments and issues that you post.</p>

        <p>Project members will always see your full email address.  By
        default, other users who visit the site will see an
        abbreviated version of your email address.</p>

        <p>If you do not wish your email address to be shared, there
        are other ways to <a href="http://www.chromium.org/getting-involved">get
        involved</a> in the community.  To report a problem when using
        the Chrome browser, you may use the "Report an issue..."  item
        on the "Help" menu.</p>


        <div class="edit-actions">
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        </div>
      </chops-dialog>

      
      
        
          <slot></slot>
        <div class="dialog-content">
          <slot></slot>
        </div>
      <dialog class="dialog" role="dialog">
        <div class="dialog-content">
          <slot></slot>
        </div>
      </dialog>
    
        This site hosts public issues in public projects<h2>This site hosts public issues in public projects</h2>

        Unlike our internal issue tracker, this site makes most
        issues public, unless the issue is labeled with a Restrict-View-*
        label, such as Restrict-View-Google.<p>Unlike our internal issue tracker, this site makes most
        issues public, unless the issue is labeled with a Restrict-View-*
        label, such as Restrict-View-Google.</p>

        Components are not used for permissions.  And, regardless of
        restriction labels, the issue reporter, owner,
        and Cc'd users may always view the issue.<p>Components are not used for permissions.  And, regardless of
        restriction labels, the issue reporter, owner,
        and Cc'd users may always view the issue.</p>

        

        
          
      
        <slot></slot>
      <button>
        <slot></slot>
      </button>
    
            Got it
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        <div class="edit-actions">
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        </div>
      <chops-dialog id="corpModeDialog" forced="">
        <h2>This site hosts public issues in public projects</h2>

        <p>Unlike our internal issue tracker, this site makes most
        issues public, unless the issue is labeled with a Restrict-View-*
        label, such as Restrict-View-Google.</p>

        <p>Components are not used for permissions.  And, regardless of
        restriction labels, the issue reporter, owner,
        and Cc'd users may always view the issue.</p>

          </chops-button>

      VULNERABILITY DETAILS<b class="line"><!---->VULNERABILITY DETAILS<!----></b><br>UAF in chromeos::multidevice::MultidevicePhoneHubHandler<span class="line"><!---->UAF in chromeos::multidevice::MultidevicePhoneHubHandler<!----></span><br><br>VERSION<b class="line"><!---->VERSION<!----></b><br>Chrome Version: [stable, beta, or dev]<span class="line"><!---->Chrome Version: [stable, beta, or dev]<!----></span><br>Operating System: Chrome<span class="line"><!---->Operating System: Chrome<!----></span><br><br>REPRODUCTION CASE<b class="line"><!---->REPRODUCTION CASE<!----></b><br>1. Download asan-linux-release-1015312 in <span class="line"><!---->1. Download asan-linux-release-1015312 in <!----></span>https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/chromium-browser-asan/o/linux-release-chromeos%2Fasan-linux-release-1015312.zip?generation=1655469268278292&alt=media<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/chromium-browser-asan/o/linux-release-chromeos%2Fasan-linux-release-1015312.zip?generation=1655469268278292&amp;alt=media"><!---->https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/chromium-browser-asan/o/linux-release-chromeos%2Fasan-linux-release-1015312.zip?generation=1655469268278292&amp;alt=media<!----></a><br><br>2. run: linux-release-chromeos_asan-linux-release-1015312/asan-linux-release-1015312/chrome-wrapper --use-system-clipboard --user-data-dir=./chromeos_vm1<span class="line"><!---->2. run: linux-release-chromeos_asan-linux-release-1015312/asan-linux-release-1015312/chrome-wrapper --use-system-clipboard --user-data-dir=./chromeos_vm1<!----></span><br><br>3. <span class="line"><!---->3. <!----></span><br>browsing `chrome://multidevice-internals/` and open devtools, execute js in console.<span class="line"><!---->browsing `chrome://multidevice-internals/` and open devtools, execute js in console.<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>chrome.send("setFakePhoneHubManagerEnabled", [true]);<span class="line"><!---->chrome.send("setFakePhoneHubManagerEnabled", [true]);<!----></span><br>chrome.send("setFakePhoneHubManagerEnabled", [true]);<span class="line"><!---->chrome.send("setFakePhoneHubManagerEnabled", [true]);<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br>FOR CRASHES, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING ADDITIONAL INFORMATION<b class="line"><!---->FOR CRASHES, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING ADDITIONAL INFORMATION<!----></b><br>Type of crash: browser<span class="line"><!---->Type of crash: browser<!----></span><br>Crash State: see asan file<span class="line"><!---->Crash State: see asan file<!----></span><br><br>CREDIT INFORMATION<b class="line"><!---->CREDIT INFORMATION<!----></b><br>Reporter credit: Nan Wang(@eternalsakura13) and Guang Gong of 360 Vulnerability Research Institute<span class="line"><!---->Reporter credit: Nan Wang(@eternalsakura13) and Guang Gong of 360 Vulnerability Research Institute<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

      <div id="availability-text" class="availability-notice" title="undefined" hidden=""><!----><!----></div>
    <mr-user-link></mr-user-link>
        on
        
      Wed, Jun 22, 2022, 4:37 AM EDT
    <chops-timestamp title="Wed, Jun 22, 2022, 4:37 AM EDT"></chops-timestamp>
        
      
        <div>
          <a class="comment-link" href="?id=1338412#c4">Comment 4<!----></a>

          
        by
        <mr-user-link></mr-user-link>
        on
        <chops-timestamp title="Wed, Jun 22, 2022, 4:37 AM EDT"></chops-timestamp>
        
      
        </div>
        
      <div role="heading" class="comment-header" aria-level="2">
        <div>
          <a class="comment-link" href="?id=1338412#c4">Comment 4<!----></a>

          
        by
        <mr-user-link></mr-user-link>
        on
        <chops-timestamp title="Wed, Jun 22, 2022, 4:37 AM EDT"></chops-timestamp>
        
      
        </div>
        
      </div>
    
      
        
        
      
        ## Root Cause<span class="line"><!---->## Root Cause<!----></span><br>[0] When we call `chrome.send("setFakePhoneHubManagerEnabled", [true]);` twice, this will call EnableFakePhoneHubManager twice, thus initializing fake_phone_hub_manager_ twice, causing the old fake_phone_hub_manager_ created for the first time to be freed.<span class="line"><!---->[0] When we call `chrome.send("setFakePhoneHubManagerEnabled", [true]);` twice, this will call EnableFakePhoneHubManager twice, thus initializing fake_phone_hub_manager_ twice, causing the old fake_phone_hub_manager_ created for the first time to be freed.<!----></span><br><br>[1] But the raw ptr of old fake_phone_hub_manager_ is saved in phone_hub_manager_ of PhoneHubUiController<span class="line"><!---->[1] But the raw ptr of old fake_phone_hub_manager_ is saved in phone_hub_manager_ of PhoneHubUiController<!----></span><br><br>[2] This will cause the raw ptr of old fake_phone_hub_manager_ to be used again in CleanUpPhoneHubManager, which will trigger UAF.<span class="line"><!---->[2] This will cause the raw ptr of old fake_phone_hub_manager_ to be used again in CleanUpPhoneHubManager, which will trigger UAF.<!----></span><br><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>void MultidevicePhoneHubHandler::EnableFakePhoneHubManager() {<span class="line"><!---->void MultidevicePhoneHubHandler::EnableFakePhoneHubManager() {<!----></span><br>  DCHECK(!fake_phone_hub_manager_);<span class="line"><!---->  DCHECK(!fake_phone_hub_manager_);<!----></span><br>  PA_LOG(VERBOSE) << "Setting fake Phone Hub Manager";<span class="line"><!---->  PA_LOG(VERBOSE) &lt;&lt; "Setting fake Phone Hub Manager";<!----></span><br>  fake_phone_hub_manager_ = std::make_unique<phonehub::FakePhoneHubManager>(); //--->[0]<span class="line"><!---->  fake_phone_hub_manager_ = std::make_unique&lt;phonehub::FakePhoneHubManager&gt;(); //---&gt;[0]<!----></span><br>  ash::SystemTray::Get()->SetPhoneHubManager(fake_phone_hub_manager_.get()); // ---->[1]<span class="line"><!---->  ash::SystemTray::Get()-&gt;SetPhoneHubManager(fake_phone_hub_manager_.get()); // ----&gt;[1]<!----></span><br>  AddObservers();<span class="line"><!---->  AddObservers();<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>void PhoneHubUiController::SetPhoneHubManager(<span class="line"><!---->void PhoneHubUiController::SetPhoneHubManager(<!----></span><br>    phonehub::PhoneHubManager* phone_hub_manager) {<span class="line"><!---->    phonehub::PhoneHubManager* phone_hub_manager) {<!----></span><br>  if (phone_hub_manager == phone_hub_manager_)<span class="line"><!---->  if (phone_hub_manager == phone_hub_manager_)<!----></span><br>    return;<span class="line"><!---->    return;<!----></span><br><br>  CleanUpPhoneHubManager();<span class="line"><!---->  CleanUpPhoneHubManager();<!----></span><br><br>  phone_hub_manager_ = phone_hub_manager;  // ---->[1]<span class="line"><!---->  phone_hub_manager_ = phone_hub_manager;  // ----&gt;[1]<!----></span><br>  if (phone_hub_manager_) {<span class="line"><!---->  if (phone_hub_manager_) {<!----></span><br>    phone_hub_manager_->GetFeatureStatusProvider()->AddObserver(this);<span class="line"><!---->    phone_hub_manager_-&gt;GetFeatureStatusProvider()-&gt;AddObserver(this);<!----></span><br>    phone_hub_manager_->GetOnboardingUiTracker()->AddObserver(this);<span class="line"><!---->    phone_hub_manager_-&gt;GetOnboardingUiTracker()-&gt;AddObserver(this);<!----></span><br>    phone_hub_manager_->GetPhoneModel()->AddObserver(this);<span class="line"><!---->    phone_hub_manager_-&gt;GetPhoneModel()-&gt;AddObserver(this);<!----></span><br>  }<span class="line"><!---->  }<!----></span><br><br>  UpdateUiState(GetUiStateFromPhoneHubManager());<span class="line"><!---->  UpdateUiState(GetUiStateFromPhoneHubManager());<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>void PhoneHubUiController::CleanUpPhoneHubManager() {<span class="line"><!---->void PhoneHubUiController::CleanUpPhoneHubManager() {<!----></span><br>  if (!phone_hub_manager_)<span class="line"><!---->  if (!phone_hub_manager_)<!----></span><br>    return;<span class="line"><!---->    return;<!----></span><br><br>  phone_hub_manager_->GetFeatureStatusProvider()->RemoveObserver(this); //---->[2]<span class="line"><!---->  phone_hub_manager_-&gt;GetFeatureStatusProvider()-&gt;RemoveObserver(this); //----&gt;[2]<!----></span><br>  phone_hub_manager_->GetOnboardingUiTracker()->RemoveObserver(this);<span class="line"><!---->  phone_hub_manager_-&gt;GetOnboardingUiTracker()-&gt;RemoveObserver(this);<!----></span><br>  phone_hub_manager_->GetPhoneModel()->RemoveObserver(this);<span class="line"><!---->  phone_hub_manager_-&gt;GetPhoneModel()-&gt;RemoveObserver(this);<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br>[0] <span class="line"><!---->[0] <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/ui/webui/chromeos/multidevice_internals/multidevice_internals_phone_hub_handler.cc;l=360;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/ui/webui/chromeos/multidevice_internals/multidevice_internals_phone_hub_handler.cc;l=360;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/ui/webui/chromeos/multidevice_internals/multidevice_internals_phone_hub_handler.cc;l=360;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4<!----></a><br>[1] <span class="line"><!---->[1] <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/system/phonehub/phone_hub_ui_controller.cc;l=92;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/system/phonehub/phone_hub_ui_controller.cc;l=92;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/system/phonehub/phone_hub_ui_controller.cc;l=92;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4<!----></a><br>[2] <span class="line"><!---->[2] <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/system/phonehub/phone_hub_ui_controller.cc;l=337;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/system/phonehub/phone_hub_ui_controller.cc;l=337;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/system/phonehub/phone_hub_ui_controller.cc;l=337;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4<!----></a><br><br>## Patch<span class="line"><!---->## Patch<!----></span><br>The patch for this vulnerability is trivial, just convert DCHECK to CHECK<span class="line"><!---->The patch for this vulnerability is trivial, just convert DCHECK to CHECK<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br> void MultidevicePhoneHubHandler::EnableFakePhoneHubManager() {<span class="line"><!----> void MultidevicePhoneHubHandler::EnableFakePhoneHubManager() {<!----></span><br>-  DCHECK(!fake_phone_hub_manager_);<span class="line"><!---->-  DCHECK(!fake_phone_hub_manager_);<!----></span><br>+  CHECK(!fake_phone_hub_manager_);<span class="line"><!---->+  CHECK(!fake_phone_hub_manager_);<!----></span><br>   PA_LOG(VERBOSE) << "Setting fake Phone Hub Manager";<span class="line"><!---->   PA_LOG(VERBOSE) &lt;&lt; "Setting fake Phone Hub Manager";<!----></span><br>   fake_phone_hub_manager_ = std::make_unique<phonehub::FakePhoneHubManager>();<span class="line"><!---->   fake_phone_hub_manager_ = std::make_unique&lt;phonehub::FakePhoneHubManager&gt;();<!----></span><br>   ash::SystemTray::Get()->SetPhoneHubManager(fake_phone_hub_manager_.get());<span class="line"><!---->   ash::SystemTray::Get()-&gt;SetPhoneHubManager(fake_phone_hub_manager_.get());<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users.       </style>

          max-width: 100%;

          display: none;
        }
        mr-phase {
          margin-bottom: 0.75em;
        }
      <style>

    <mr-launch-overview class="main-item" hidden=""><!---->
      <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/icon?family=Material+Icons" rel="stylesheet">
      <style>
        mr-launch-overview {
          max-width: 100%;
          display: flex;

            <div class="container-issue-content">
              <mr-issue-details class="main-item"><!---->

        mr-issue-details {

      VULNERABILITY DETAILS<b class="line"><!---->VULNERABILITY DETAILS<!----></b><br>UAF in chromeos::multidevice::MultidevicePhoneHubHandler<span class="line"><!---->UAF in chromeos::multidevice::MultidevicePhoneHubHandler<!----></span><br><br>VERSION<b class="line"><!---->VERSION<!----></b><br>Chrome Version: [stable, beta, or dev]<span class="line"><!---->Chrome Version: [stable, beta, or dev]<!----></span><br>Operating System: Chrome<span class="line"><!---->Operating System: Chrome<!----></span><br><br>REPRODUCTION CASE<b class="line"><!---->REPRODUCTION CASE<!----></b><br>1. Download asan-linux-release-1015312 in <span class="line"><!---->1. Download asan-linux-release-1015312 in <!----></span>https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/chromium-browser-asan/o/linux-release-chromeos%2Fasan-linux-release-1015312.zip?generation=1655469268278292&alt=media<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/chromium-browser-asan/o/linux-release-chromeos%2Fasan-linux-release-1015312.zip?generation=1655469268278292&amp;alt=media"><!---->https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/chromium-browser-asan/o/linux-release-chromeos%2Fasan-linux-release-1015312.zip?generation=1655469268278292&amp;alt=media<!----></a><br><br>2. run: linux-release-chromeos_asan-linux-release-1015312/asan-linux-release-1015312/chrome-wrapper --use-system-clipboard --user-data-dir=./chromeos_vm1<span class="line"><!---->2. run: linux-release-chromeos_asan-linux-release-1015312/asan-linux-release-1015312/chrome-wrapper --use-system-clipboard --user-data-dir=./chromeos_vm1<!----></span><br><br>3. <span class="line"><!---->3. <!----></span><br>browsing `chrome://multidevice-internals/` and open devtools, execute js in console.<span class="line"><!---->browsing `chrome://multidevice-internals/` and open devtools, execute js in console.<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>chrome.send("setFakePhoneHubManagerEnabled", [true]);<span class="line"><!---->chrome.send("setFakePhoneHubManagerEnabled", [true]);<!----></span><br>chrome.send("setFakePhoneHubManagerEnabled", [true]);<span class="line"><!---->chrome.send("setFakePhoneHubManagerEnabled", [true]);<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br>FOR CRASHES, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING ADDITIONAL INFORMATION<b class="line"><!---->FOR CRASHES, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING ADDITIONAL INFORMATION<!----></b><br>Type of crash: browser<span class="line"><!---->Type of crash: browser<!----></span><br>Crash State: see asan file<span class="line"><!---->Crash State: see asan file<!----></span><br><br>CREDIT INFORMATION<b class="line"><!---->CREDIT INFORMATION<!----></b><br>Reporter credit: Nan Wang(@eternalsakura13) and Guang Gong of 360 Vulnerability Research Institute<span class="line"><!---->Reporter credit: Nan Wang(@eternalsakura13) and Guang Gong of 360 Vulnerability Research Institute<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

      etern...@gmail.com<span id="user-text" hidden=""><!---->etern...@gmail.com<!----></span>

        <div>
          <a class="comment-link" href="?id=1338412#c4">Comment 4<!----></a>

          
        by
        <mr-user-link></mr-user-link>
        on
        <chops-timestamp title="Wed, Jun 22, 2022, 4:37 AM EDT"></chops-timestamp>
        
      
        </div>
        
      <div role="heading" class="comment-header" aria-level="2">
        <div>
          <a class="comment-link" href="?id=1338412#c4">Comment 4<!----></a>

          
        by
        <mr-user-link></mr-user-link>
        on
        <chops-timestamp title="Wed, Jun 22, 2022, 4:37 AM EDT"></chops-timestamp>
        
      
        </div>
        
      </div>
    
      
        
        
      
        ## Root Cause<span class="line"><!---->## Root Cause<!----></span><br>[0] When we call `chrome.send("setFakePhoneHubManagerEnabled", [true]);` twice, this will call EnableFakePhoneHubManager twice, thus initializing fake_phone_hub_manager_ twice, causing the old fake_phone_hub_manager_ created for the first time to be freed.<span class="line"><!---->[0] When we call `chrome.send("setFakePhoneHubManagerEnabled", [true]);` twice, this will call EnableFakePhoneHubManager twice, thus initializing fake_phone_hub_manager_ twice, causing the old fake_phone_hub_manager_ created for the first time to be freed.<!----></span><br><br>[1] But the raw ptr of old fake_phone_hub_manager_ is saved in phone_hub_manager_ of PhoneHubUiController<span class="line"><!---->[1] But the raw ptr of old fake_phone_hub_manager_ is saved in phone_hub_manager_ of PhoneHubUiController<!----></span><br><br>[2] This will cause the raw ptr of old fake_phone_hub_manager_ to be used again in CleanUpPhoneHubManager, which will trigger UAF.<span class="line"><!---->[2] This will cause the raw ptr of old fake_phone_hub_manager_ to be used again in CleanUpPhoneHubManager, which will trigger UAF.<!----></span><br><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>void MultidevicePhoneHubHandler::EnableFakePhoneHubManager() {<span class="line"><!---->void MultidevicePhoneHubHandler::EnableFakePhoneHubManager() {<!----></span><br>  DCHECK(!fake_phone_hub_manager_);<span class="line"><!---->  DCHECK(!fake_phone_hub_manager_);<!----></span><br>  PA_LOG(VERBOSE) << "Setting fake Phone Hub Manager";<span class="line"><!---->  PA_LOG(VERBOSE) &lt;&lt; "Setting fake Phone Hub Manager";<!----></span><br>  fake_phone_hub_manager_ = std::make_unique<phonehub::FakePhoneHubManager>(); //--->[0]<span class="line"><!---->  fake_phone_hub_manager_ = std::make_unique&lt;phonehub::FakePhoneHubManager&gt;(); //---&gt;[0]<!----></span><br>  ash::SystemTray::Get()->SetPhoneHubManager(fake_phone_hub_manager_.get()); // ---->[1]<span class="line"><!---->  ash::SystemTray::Get()-&gt;SetPhoneHubManager(fake_phone_hub_manager_.get()); // ----&gt;[1]<!----></span><br>  AddObservers();<span class="line"><!---->  AddObservers();<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>void PhoneHubUiController::SetPhoneHubManager(<span class="line"><!---->void PhoneHubUiController::SetPhoneHubManager(<!----></span><br>    phonehub::PhoneHubManager* phone_hub_manager) {<span class="line"><!---->    phonehub::PhoneHubManager* phone_hub_manager) {<!----></span><br>  if (phone_hub_manager == phone_hub_manager_)<span class="line"><!---->  if (phone_hub_manager == phone_hub_manager_)<!----></span><br>    return;<span class="line"><!---->    return;<!----></span><br><br>  CleanUpPhoneHubManager();<span class="line"><!---->  CleanUpPhoneHubManager();<!----></span><br><br>  phone_hub_manager_ = phone_hub_manager;  // ---->[1]<span class="line"><!---->  phone_hub_manager_ = phone_hub_manager;  // ----&gt;[1]<!----></span><br>  if (phone_hub_manager_) {<span class="line"><!---->  if (phone_hub_manager_) {<!----></span><br>    phone_hub_manager_->GetFeatureStatusProvider()->AddObserver(this);<span class="line"><!---->    phone_hub_manager_-&gt;GetFeatureStatusProvider()-&gt;AddObserver(this);<!----></span><br>    phone_hub_manager_->GetOnboardingUiTracker()->AddObserver(this);<span class="line"><!---->    phone_hub_manager_-&gt;GetOnboardingUiTracker()-&gt;AddObserver(this);<!----></span><br>    phone_hub_manager_->GetPhoneModel()->AddObserver(this);<span class="line"><!---->    phone_hub_manager_-&gt;GetPhoneModel()-&gt;AddObserver(this);<!----></span><br>  }<span class="line"><!---->  }<!----></span><br><br>  UpdateUiState(GetUiStateFromPhoneHubManager());<span class="line"><!---->  UpdateUiState(GetUiStateFromPhoneHubManager());<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>void PhoneHubUiController::CleanUpPhoneHubManager() {<span class="line"><!---->void PhoneHubUiController::CleanUpPhoneHubManager() {<!----></span><br>  if (!phone_hub_manager_)<span class="line"><!---->  if (!phone_hub_manager_)<!----></span><br>    return;<span class="line"><!---->    return;<!----></span><br><br>  phone_hub_manager_->GetFeatureStatusProvider()->RemoveObserver(this); //---->[2]<span class="line"><!---->  phone_hub_manager_-&gt;GetFeatureStatusProvider()-&gt;RemoveObserver(this); //----&gt;[2]<!----></span><br>  phone_hub_manager_->GetOnboardingUiTracker()->RemoveObserver(this);<span class="line"><!---->  phone_hub_manager_-&gt;GetOnboardingUiTracker()-&gt;RemoveObserver(this);<!----></span><br>  phone_hub_manager_->GetPhoneModel()->RemoveObserver(this);<span class="line"><!---->  phone_hub_manager_-&gt;GetPhoneModel()-&gt;RemoveObserver(this);<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br>[0] <span class="line"><!---->[0] <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/ui/webui/chromeos/multidevice_internals/multidevice_internals_phone_hub_handler.cc;l=360;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/ui/webui/chromeos/multidevice_internals/multidevice_internals_phone_hub_handler.cc;l=360;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/ui/webui/chromeos/multidevice_internals/multidevice_internals_phone_hub_handler.cc;l=360;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4<!----></a><br>[1] <span class="line"><!---->[1] <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/system/phonehub/phone_hub_ui_controller.cc;l=92;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/system/phonehub/phone_hub_ui_controller.cc;l=92;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/system/phonehub/phone_hub_ui_controller.cc;l=92;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4<!----></a><br>[2] <span class="line"><!---->[2] <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/system/phonehub/phone_hub_ui_controller.cc;l=337;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/system/phonehub/phone_hub_ui_controller.cc;l=337;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/system/phonehub/phone_hub_ui_controller.cc;l=337;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4<!----></a><br><br>## Patch<span class="line"><!---->## Patch<!----></span><br>The patch for this vulnerability is trivial, just convert DCHECK to CHECK<span class="line"><!---->The patch for this vulnerability is trivial, just convert DCHECK to CHECK<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br> void MultidevicePhoneHubHandler::EnableFakePhoneHubManager() {<span class="line"><!----> void MultidevicePhoneHubHandler::EnableFakePhoneHubManager() {<!----></span><br>-  DCHECK(!fake_phone_hub_manager_);<span class="line"><!---->-  DCHECK(!fake_phone_hub_manager_);<!----></span><br>+  CHECK(!fake_phone_hub_manager_);<span class="line"><!---->+  CHECK(!fake_phone_hub_manager_);<!----></span><br>   PA_LOG(VERBOSE) << "Setting fake Phone Hub Manager";<span class="line"><!---->   PA_LOG(VERBOSE) &lt;&lt; "Setting fake Phone Hub Manager";<!----></span><br>   fake_phone_hub_manager_ = std::make_unique<phonehub::FakePhoneHubManager>();<span class="line"><!---->   fake_phone_hub_manager_ = std::make_unique&lt;phonehub::FakePhoneHubManager&gt;();<!----></span><br>   ash::SystemTray::Get()->SetPhoneHubManager(fake_phone_hub_manager_.get());<span class="line"><!---->   ash::SystemTray::Get()-&gt;SetPhoneHubManager(fake_phone_hub_manager_.get());<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users.       </style>

          max-width: 100%;

          display: none;
        }
        mr-phase {
          margin-bottom: 0.75em;
        }
      <style>

    <mr-launch-overview class="main-item" hidden=""><!---->
      <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/icon?family=Material+Icons" rel="stylesheet">
      <style>
        mr-launch-overview {
          max-width: 100%;
          display: flex;

            <div class="container-issue-content">
              <mr-issue-details class="main-item"><!---->

      VULNERABILITY DETAILS<b class="line"><!---->VULNERABILITY DETAILS<!----></b><br>UAF in chromeos::multidevice::MultidevicePhoneHubHandler<span class="line"><!---->UAF in chromeos::multidevice::MultidevicePhoneHubHandler<!----></span><br><br>VERSION<b class="line"><!---->VERSION<!----></b><br>Chrome Version: [stable, beta, or dev]<span class="line"><!---->Chrome Version: [stable, beta, or dev]<!----></span><br>Operating System: Chrome<span class="line"><!---->Operating System: Chrome<!----></span><br><br>REPRODUCTION CASE<b class="line"><!---->REPRODUCTION CASE<!----></b><br>1. Download asan-linux-release-1015312 in <span class="line"><!---->1. Download asan-linux-release-1015312 in <!----></span>https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/chromium-browser-asan/o/linux-release-chromeos%2Fasan-linux-release-1015312.zip?generation=1655469268278292&alt=media<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/chromium-browser-asan/o/linux-release-chromeos%2Fasan-linux-release-1015312.zip?generation=1655469268278292&amp;alt=media"><!---->https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/chromium-browser-asan/o/linux-release-chromeos%2Fasan-linux-release-1015312.zip?generation=1655469268278292&amp;alt=media<!----></a><br><br>2. run: linux-release-chromeos_asan-linux-release-1015312/asan-linux-release-1015312/chrome-wrapper --use-system-clipboard --user-data-dir=./chromeos_vm1<span class="line"><!---->2. run: linux-release-chromeos_asan-linux-release-1015312/asan-linux-release-1015312/chrome-wrapper --use-system-clipboard --user-data-dir=./chromeos_vm1<!----></span><br><br>3. <span class="line"><!---->3. <!----></span><br>browsing `chrome://multidevice-internals/` and open devtools, execute js in console.<span class="line"><!---->browsing `chrome://multidevice-internals/` and open devtools, execute js in console.<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>chrome.send("setFakePhoneHubManagerEnabled", [true]);<span class="line"><!---->chrome.send("setFakePhoneHubManagerEnabled", [true]);<!----></span><br>chrome.send("setFakePhoneHubManagerEnabled", [true]);<span class="line"><!---->chrome.send("setFakePhoneHubManagerEnabled", [true]);<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br>FOR CRASHES, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING ADDITIONAL INFORMATION<b class="line"><!---->FOR CRASHES, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING ADDITIONAL INFORMATION<!----></b><br>Type of crash: browser<span class="line"><!---->Type of crash: browser<!----></span><br>Crash State: see asan file<span class="line"><!---->Crash State: see asan file<!----></span><br><br>CREDIT INFORMATION<b class="line"><!---->CREDIT INFORMATION<!----></b><br>Reporter credit: Nan Wang(@eternalsakura13) and Guang Gong of 360 Vulnerability Research Institute<span class="line"><!---->Reporter credit: Nan Wang(@eternalsakura13) and Guang Gong of 360 Vulnerability Research Institute<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

          Comment 4<a class="comment-link" href="?id=1338412#c4">Comment 4<!----></a>

          
        by
        
      <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/icon?family=Material+Icons" rel="stylesheet">

        <div>
          <a class="comment-link" href="?id=1338412#c4">Comment 4<!----></a>

          
        by
        <mr-user-link></mr-user-link>
        on
        <chops-timestamp title="Wed, Jun 22, 2022, 4:37 AM EDT"></chops-timestamp>
        
      
        </div>
        
      <div role="heading" class="comment-header" aria-level="2">
        <div>
          <a class="comment-link" href="?id=1338412#c4">Comment 4<!----></a>

          
        by
        <mr-user-link></mr-user-link>
        on
        <chops-timestamp title="Wed, Jun 22, 2022, 4:37 AM EDT"></chops-timestamp>
        
      
        </div>
        
      </div>
    
      
        
        
      
        ## Root Cause<span class="line"><!---->## Root Cause<!----></span><br>[0] When we call `chrome.send("setFakePhoneHubManagerEnabled", [true]);` twice, this will call EnableFakePhoneHubManager twice, thus initializing fake_phone_hub_manager_ twice, causing the old fake_phone_hub_manager_ created for the first time to be freed.<span class="line"><!---->[0] When we call `chrome.send("setFakePhoneHubManagerEnabled", [true]);` twice, this will call EnableFakePhoneHubManager twice, thus initializing fake_phone_hub_manager_ twice, causing the old fake_phone_hub_manager_ created for the first time to be freed.<!----></span><br><br>[1] But the raw ptr of old fake_phone_hub_manager_ is saved in phone_hub_manager_ of PhoneHubUiController<span class="line"><!---->[1] But the raw ptr of old fake_phone_hub_manager_ is saved in phone_hub_manager_ of PhoneHubUiController<!----></span><br><br>[2] This will cause the raw ptr of old fake_phone_hub_manager_ to be used again in CleanUpPhoneHubManager, which will trigger UAF.<span class="line"><!---->[2] This will cause the raw ptr of old fake_phone_hub_manager_ to be used again in CleanUpPhoneHubManager, which will trigger UAF.<!----></span><br><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>void MultidevicePhoneHubHandler::EnableFakePhoneHubManager() {<span class="line"><!---->void MultidevicePhoneHubHandler::EnableFakePhoneHubManager() {<!----></span><br>  DCHECK(!fake_phone_hub_manager_);<span class="line"><!---->  DCHECK(!fake_phone_hub_manager_);<!----></span><br>  PA_LOG(VERBOSE) << "Setting fake Phone Hub Manager";<span class="line"><!---->  PA_LOG(VERBOSE) &lt;&lt; "Setting fake Phone Hub Manager";<!----></span><br>  fake_phone_hub_manager_ = std::make_unique<phonehub::FakePhoneHubManager>(); //--->[0]<span class="line"><!---->  fake_phone_hub_manager_ = std::make_unique&lt;phonehub::FakePhoneHubManager&gt;(); //---&gt;[0]<!----></span><br>  ash::SystemTray::Get()->SetPhoneHubManager(fake_phone_hub_manager_.get()); // ---->[1]<span class="line"><!---->  ash::SystemTray::Get()-&gt;SetPhoneHubManager(fake_phone_hub_manager_.get()); // ----&gt;[1]<!----></span><br>  AddObservers();<span class="line"><!---->  AddObservers();<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>void PhoneHubUiController::SetPhoneHubManager(<span class="line"><!---->void PhoneHubUiController::SetPhoneHubManager(<!----></span><br>    phonehub::PhoneHubManager* phone_hub_manager) {<span class="line"><!---->    phonehub::PhoneHubManager* phone_hub_manager) {<!----></span><br>  if (phone_hub_manager == phone_hub_manager_)<span class="line"><!---->  if (phone_hub_manager == phone_hub_manager_)<!----></span><br>    return;<span class="line"><!---->    return;<!----></span><br><br>  CleanUpPhoneHubManager();<span class="line"><!---->  CleanUpPhoneHubManager();<!----></span><br><br>  phone_hub_manager_ = phone_hub_manager;  // ---->[1]<span class="line"><!---->  phone_hub_manager_ = phone_hub_manager;  // ----&gt;[1]<!----></span><br>  if (phone_hub_manager_) {<span class="line"><!---->  if (phone_hub_manager_) {<!----></span><br>    phone_hub_manager_->GetFeatureStatusProvider()->AddObserver(this);<span class="line"><!---->    phone_hub_manager_-&gt;GetFeatureStatusProvider()-&gt;AddObserver(this);<!----></span><br>    phone_hub_manager_->GetOnboardingUiTracker()->AddObserver(this);<span class="line"><!---->    phone_hub_manager_-&gt;GetOnboardingUiTracker()-&gt;AddObserver(this);<!----></span><br>    phone_hub_manager_->GetPhoneModel()->AddObserver(this);<span class="line"><!---->    phone_hub_manager_-&gt;GetPhoneModel()-&gt;AddObserver(this);<!----></span><br>  }<span class="line"><!---->  }<!----></span><br><br>  UpdateUiState(GetUiStateFromPhoneHubManager());<span class="line"><!---->  UpdateUiState(GetUiStateFromPhoneHubManager());<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>void PhoneHubUiController::CleanUpPhoneHubManager() {<span class="line"><!---->void PhoneHubUiController::CleanUpPhoneHubManager() {<!----></span><br>  if (!phone_hub_manager_)<span class="line"><!---->  if (!phone_hub_manager_)<!----></span><br>    return;<span class="line"><!---->    return;<!----></span><br><br>  phone_hub_manager_->GetFeatureStatusProvider()->RemoveObserver(this); //---->[2]<span class="line"><!---->  phone_hub_manager_-&gt;GetFeatureStatusProvider()-&gt;RemoveObserver(this); //----&gt;[2]<!----></span><br>  phone_hub_manager_->GetOnboardingUiTracker()->RemoveObserver(this);<span class="line"><!---->  phone_hub_manager_-&gt;GetOnboardingUiTracker()-&gt;RemoveObserver(this);<!----></span><br>  phone_hub_manager_->GetPhoneModel()->RemoveObserver(this);<span class="line"><!---->  phone_hub_manager_-&gt;GetPhoneModel()-&gt;RemoveObserver(this);<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br>[0] <span class="line"><!---->[0] <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/ui/webui/chromeos/multidevice_internals/multidevice_internals_phone_hub_handler.cc;l=360;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/ui/webui/chromeos/multidevice_internals/multidevice_internals_phone_hub_handler.cc;l=360;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/ui/webui/chromeos/multidevice_internals/multidevice_internals_phone_hub_handler.cc;l=360;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4<!----></a><br>[1] <span class="line"><!---->[1] <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/system/phonehub/phone_hub_ui_controller.cc;l=92;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/system/phonehub/phone_hub_ui_controller.cc;l=92;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/system/phonehub/phone_hub_ui_controller.cc;l=92;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4<!----></a><br>[2] <span class="line"><!---->[2] <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/system/phonehub/phone_hub_ui_controller.cc;l=337;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/system/phonehub/phone_hub_ui_controller.cc;l=337;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/system/phonehub/phone_hub_ui_controller.cc;l=337;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4<!----></a><br><br>## Patch<span class="line"><!---->## Patch<!----></span><br>The patch for this vulnerability is trivial, just convert DCHECK to CHECK<span class="line"><!---->The patch for this vulnerability is trivial, just convert DCHECK to CHECK<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br> void MultidevicePhoneHubHandler::EnableFakePhoneHubManager() {<span class="line"><!----> void MultidevicePhoneHubHandler::EnableFakePhoneHubManager() {<!----></span><br>-  DCHECK(!fake_phone_hub_manager_);<span class="line"><!---->-  DCHECK(!fake_phone_hub_manager_);<!----></span><br>+  CHECK(!fake_phone_hub_manager_);<span class="line"><!---->+  CHECK(!fake_phone_hub_manager_);<!----></span><br>   PA_LOG(VERBOSE) << "Setting fake Phone Hub Manager";<span class="line"><!---->   PA_LOG(VERBOSE) &lt;&lt; "Setting fake Phone Hub Manager";<!----></span><br>   fake_phone_hub_manager_ = std::make_unique<phonehub::FakePhoneHubManager>();<span class="line"><!---->   fake_phone_hub_manager_ = std::make_unique&lt;phonehub::FakePhoneHubManager&gt;();<!----></span><br>   ash::SystemTray::Get()->SetPhoneHubManager(fake_phone_hub_manager_.get());<span class="line"><!---->   ash::SystemTray::Get()-&gt;SetPhoneHubManager(fake_phone_hub_manager_.get());<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users.       VULNERABILITY DETAILS<b class="line"><!---->VULNERABILITY DETAILS<!----></b><br>UAF in chromeos::multidevice::MultidevicePhoneHubHandler<span class="line"><!---->UAF in chromeos::multidevice::MultidevicePhoneHubHandler<!----></span><br><br>VERSION<b class="line"><!---->VERSION<!----></b><br>Chrome Version: [stable, beta, or dev]<span class="line"><!---->Chrome Version: [stable, beta, or dev]<!----></span><br>Operating System: Chrome<span class="line"><!---->Operating System: Chrome<!----></span><br><br>REPRODUCTION CASE<b class="line"><!---->REPRODUCTION CASE<!----></b><br>1. Download asan-linux-release-1015312 in <span class="line"><!---->1. Download asan-linux-release-1015312 in <!----></span>https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/chromium-browser-asan/o/linux-release-chromeos%2Fasan-linux-release-1015312.zip?generation=1655469268278292&alt=media<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/chromium-browser-asan/o/linux-release-chromeos%2Fasan-linux-release-1015312.zip?generation=1655469268278292&amp;alt=media"><!---->https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/chromium-browser-asan/o/linux-release-chromeos%2Fasan-linux-release-1015312.zip?generation=1655469268278292&amp;alt=media<!----></a><br><br>2. run: linux-release-chromeos_asan-linux-release-1015312/asan-linux-release-1015312/chrome-wrapper --use-system-clipboard --user-data-dir=./chromeos_vm1<span class="line"><!---->2. run: linux-release-chromeos_asan-linux-release-1015312/asan-linux-release-1015312/chrome-wrapper --use-system-clipboard --user-data-dir=./chromeos_vm1<!----></span><br><br>3. <span class="line"><!---->3. <!----></span><br>browsing `chrome://multidevice-internals/` and open devtools, execute js in console.<span class="line"><!---->browsing `chrome://multidevice-internals/` and open devtools, execute js in console.<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>chrome.send("setFakePhoneHubManagerEnabled", [true]);<span class="line"><!---->chrome.send("setFakePhoneHubManagerEnabled", [true]);<!----></span><br>chrome.send("setFakePhoneHubManagerEnabled", [true]);<span class="line"><!---->chrome.send("setFakePhoneHubManagerEnabled", [true]);<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br>FOR CRASHES, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING ADDITIONAL INFORMATION<b class="line"><!---->FOR CRASHES, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING ADDITIONAL INFORMATION<!----></b><br>Type of crash: browser<span class="line"><!---->Type of crash: browser<!----></span><br>Crash State: see asan file<span class="line"><!---->Crash State: see asan file<!----></span><br><br>CREDIT INFORMATION<b class="line"><!---->CREDIT           Comment 4<a class="comment-link" href="?id=1338412#c4">Comment 4<!----></a>

          
        by
        
      <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/icon?family=Material+Icons" rel="stylesheet">
      schedule<i id="availability-icon" class="material-icons inline-icon ${user.last_visit_timestamp ? '': 'inline-icon-unseen'}" title="undefined" hidden="">schedule</i>

        <div>
          <a class="comment-link" href="?id=1338412#c4">Comment 4<!----></a>

          
        by
        <mr-user-link></mr-user-link>
        on
        <chops-timestamp title="Wed, Jun 22, 2022, 4:37 AM EDT"></chops-timestamp>
        
      
        </div>
        
      <div role="heading" class="comment-header" aria-level="2">
        <div>
          <a class="comment-link" href="?id=1338412#c4">Comment 4<!----></a>

          
        by
        <mr-user-link></mr-user-link>
        on
        <chops-timestamp title="Wed, Jun 22, 2022, 4:37 AM EDT"></chops-timestamp>
        
      
        </div>
        
      </div>
    
      
        
        
      
        ## Root Cause<span class="line"><!---->## Root Cause<!----></span><br>[0] When we call `chrome.send("setFakePhoneHubManagerEnabled", [true]);` twice, this will call EnableFakePhoneHubManager twice, thus initializing fake_phone_hub_manager_ twice, causing the old fake_phone_hub_manager_ created for the first time to be freed.<span class="line"><!---->[0] When we call `chrome.send("setFakePhoneHubManagerEnabled", [true]);` twice, this will call EnableFakePhoneHubManager twice, thus initializing fake_phone_hub_manager_ twice, causing the old fake_phone_hub_manager_ created for the first time to be freed.<!----></span><br><br>[1] But the raw ptr of old fake_phone_hub_manager_ is saved in phone_hub_manager_ of PhoneHubUiController<span class="line"><!---->[1] But the raw ptr of old fake_phone_hub_manager_ is saved in phone_hub_manager_ of PhoneHubUiController<!----></span><br><br>[2] This will cause the raw ptr of old fake_phone_hub_manager_ to be used again in CleanUpPhoneHubManager, which will trigger UAF.<span class="line"><!---->[2] This will cause the raw ptr of old fake_phone_hub_manager_ to be used again in CleanUpPhoneHubManager, which will trigger UAF.<!----></span><br><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>void MultidevicePhoneHubHandler::EnableFakePhoneHubManager() {<span class="line"><!---->void MultidevicePhoneHubHandler::EnableFakePhoneHubManager() {<!----></span><br>  DCHECK(!fake_phone_hub_manager_);<span class="line"><!---->  DCHECK(!fake_phone_hub_manager_);<!----></span><br>  PA_LOG(VERBOSE) << "Setting fake Phone Hub Manager";<span class="line"><!---->  PA_LOG(VERBOSE) &lt;&lt; "Setting fake Phone Hub Manager";<!----></span><br>  fake_phone_hub_manager_ = std::make_unique<phonehub::FakePhoneHubManager>(); //--->[0]<span class="line"><!---->  fake_phone_hub_manager_ = std::make_unique&lt;phonehub::FakePhoneHubManager&gt;(); //---&gt;[0]<!----></span><br>  ash::SystemTray::Get()->SetPhoneHubManager(fake_phone_hub_manager_.get()); // ---->[1]<span class="line"><!---->  ash::SystemTray::Get()-&gt;SetPhoneHubManager(fake_phone_hub_manager_.get()); // ----&gt;[1]<!----></span><br>  AddObservers();<span class="line"><!---->  AddObservers();<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>void PhoneHubUiController::SetPhoneHubManager(<span class="line"><!---->void PhoneHubUiController::SetPhoneHubManager(<!----></span><br>    phonehub::PhoneHubManager* phone_hub_manager) {<span class="line"><!---->    phonehub::PhoneHubManager* phone_hub_manager) {<!----></span><br>  if (phone_hub_manager == phone_hub_manager_)<span class="line"><!---->  if (phone_hub_manager == phone_hub_manager_)<!----></span><br>    return;<span just convert DCHECK to CHECK<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br> void MultidevicePhoneHubHandler::EnableFakePhoneHubManager() {<span class="line"><!----> void         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>
        
          
        <div>
          
        </div>
      <div class="comment-body">
        <mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>
        <div>
          
        </div>
      </div>

      VULNERABILITY DETAILS<b class="line"><!---->VULNERABILITY DETAILS<!----></b><br>UAF in chromeos::multidevice::MultidevicePhoneHubHandler<span class="line"><!---->UAF in chromeos::multidevice::MultidevicePhoneHubHandler<!----></span><br><br>VERSION<b class="line"><!---->VERSION<!----></b><br>Chrome Version: [stable, beta, or dev]<span class="line"><!---->Chrome Version: [stable, beta, or dev]<!----></span><br>Operating System: Chrome<span class="line"><!---->Operating System: Chrome<!----></span><br><br>REPRODUCTION CASE<b class="line"><!---->REPRODUCTION CASE<!----></b><br>1. Download asan-linux-release-1015312 in <span class="line"><!---->1. Download asan-linux-release-1015312 in <!----></span>https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/chromium-browser-asan/o/linux-release-chromeos%2Fasan-linux-release-1015312.zip?generation=1655469268278292&alt=media<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/chromium-browser-asan/o/linux-release-chromeos%2Fasan-linux-release-1015312.zip?generation=1655469268278292&amp;alt=media"><!---->https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/chromium-browser-asan/o/linux-release-chromeos%2Fasan-linux-release-1015312.zip?generation=1655469268278292&amp;alt=media<!----></a><br><br>2. run: linux-release-chromeos_asan-linux-release-1015312/asan-linux-release-1015312/chrome-wrapper --use-system-clipboard --user-data-dir=./chromeos_vm1<span class="line"><!---->2. run: linux-release-chromeos_asan-linux-release-1015312/asan-linux-release-1015312/chrome-wrapper --use-system-clipboard --user-data-dir=./chromeos_vm1<!----></span><br><br>3. <span class="line"><!---->3. <!----></span><br>browsing `chrome://multidevice-internals/` and open devtools, execute js in console.<span class="line"><!---->browsing `chrome://multidevice-internals/` and open devtools, execute js in console.<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>chrome.send("setFakePhoneHubManagerEnabled", [true]);<span class="line"><!---->chrome.send("setFakePhoneHubManagerEnabled", [true]);<!----></span><br>chrome.send("setFakePhoneHubManagerEnabled", [true]);<span class="line"><!---->chrome.send("setFakePhoneHubManagerEnabled", [true]);<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br>FOR CRASHES, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING ADDITIONAL INFORMATION<b class="line"><!---->FOR CRASHES, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING ADDITIONAL INFORMATION<!----></b><br>Type of crash: browser<span class="line"><!---->Type of crash: browser<!----></span><br>Crash State: see asan file<span class="line"><!---->Crash State: see asan file<!----></span><br><br>CREDIT INFORMATION<b class="line"><!---->CREDIT INFORMATION<!----></b><br>Reporter credit: Nan Wang(@eternalsakura13) and Guang Gong of 360 Vulnerability Research Institute<span class="line"><!---->Reporter credit: Nan Wang(@eternalsakura13) and Guang Gong of 360 Vulnerability Research Institute<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

          Comment 4<a class="comment-link" href="?id=1338412#c4">Comment 4<!----></a>

          
        by
        
      <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/icon?family=Material+Icons" rel="stylesheet">
      schedule<i id="availability-icon" class="material-icons inline-icon ${user.last_visit_timestamp ? '': 'inline-icon-unseen'}" title="undefined" hidden="">schedule</i>
      etern...@gmail.com<a id="user-link" href="/u/3569758341" title="etern...@gmail.com"><!---->etern...@gmail.com<!----></a>

      <div id="availability-text" class="availability-notice" title="undefined" hidden=""><!----><!----></div>
    <mr-user-link></mr-user-link>
        on
        
      Wed, Jun 22, 2022, 4:37 AM EDT
    <chops-timestamp title="Wed, Jun 22, 2022, 4:37 AM EDT"></chops-timestamp>
        
      
        <div>
          <a class="comment-link" href="?id=1338412#c4">Comment 4<!----></a>

          
        by
        <mr-user-link></mr-user-link>
        on
        <chops-timestamp title="Wed, Jun 22, 2022, 4:37 AM EDT"></chops-timestamp>
        
      
        </div>
        
      <div role="heading" class="comment-header" aria-level="2">
        <div>
          <a class="comment-link" href="?id=1338412#c4">Comment 4<!----></a>

          
        by
        <mr-user-link></mr-user-link>
        on
        <chops-timestamp title="Wed, Jun 22, 2022, 4:37 AM EDT"></chops-timestamp>
        
      
        </div>
        
      </div>
    
      
        
        
      
        ## Root Cause<span class="line"><!---->## Root Cause<!----></span><br>[0] When we call `chrome.send("setFakePhoneHubManagerEnabled", [true]);` twice, this will call EnableFakePhoneHubManager twice, thus initializing fake_phone_hub_manager_ twice, causing the old fake_phone_hub_manager_ created for the first time to be freed.<span class="line"><!---->[0] When we call `chrome.send("setFakePhoneHubManagerEnabled", [true]);` twice, this will call EnableFakePhoneHubManager twice, thus initializing fake_phone_hub_manager_ twice, causing the old fake_phone_hub_manager_ created for the first time to be freed.<!----></span><br><br>[1] But the raw ptr of old fake_phone_hub_manager_ is saved in phone_hub_manager_ of PhoneHubUiController<span class="line"><!---->[1] But the raw ptr of old fake_phone_hub_manager_ is saved in phone_hub_manager_ of PhoneHubUiController<!----></span><br><br>[2] This will cause the raw ptr of old fake_phone_hub_manager_ to be used again in CleanUpPhoneHubManager, which will trigger UAF.<span class="line"><!---->[2] This will cause the raw ptr of old fake_phone_hub_manager_ to be used again in CleanUpPhoneHubManager, which will trigger UAF.<!----></span><br><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>void MultidevicePhoneHubHandler::EnableFakePhoneHubManager() {<span class="line"><!---->void MultidevicePhoneHubHandler::EnableFakePhoneHubManager() {<!----></span><br>  DCHECK(!fake_phone_hub_manager_);<span class="line"><!---->  DCHECK(!fake_phone_hub_manager_);<!----></span><br>  PA_LOG(VERBOSE) << "Setting fake Phone Hub Manager";<span class="line"><!---->  PA_LOG(VERBOSE) &lt;&lt; "Setting fake Phone Hub Manager";<!----></span><br>  fake_phone_hub_manager_ = std::make_unique<phonehub::FakePhoneHubManager>(); //--->[0]<span class="line"><!---->  fake_phone_hub_manager_ = std::make_unique&lt;phonehub::FakePhoneHubManager&gt;(); //---&gt;[0]<!----></span><br>  ash::SystemTray::Get()->SetPhoneHubManager(fake_phone_hub_manager_.get()); // ---->[1]<span class="line"><!---->  ash::SystemTray::Get()-&gt;SetPhoneHubManager(fake_phone_hub_manager_.get()); // ----&gt;[1]<!----></span><br>  AddObservers();<span class="line"><!---->  AddObservers();<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>void PhoneHubUiController::SetPhoneHubManager(<span class="line"><!---->void PhoneHubUiController::SetPhoneHubManager(<!----></span><br>    phonehub::PhoneHubManager* phone_hub_manager) {<span class="line"><!---->    phonehub::PhoneHubManager* phone_hub_manager) {<!----></span><br>  if (phone_hub_manager == phone_hub_manager_)<span class="line"><!---->  if (phone_hub_manager == phone_hub_manager_)<!----></span><br>    return;<span class="line"><!---->    return;<!----></span><br><br>  CleanUpPhoneHubManager();<span class="line"><!---->  CleanUpPhoneHubManager();<!----></span><br><br>  phone_hub_manager_ = phone_hub_manager;  // ---->[1]<span class="line"><!---->  phone_hub_manager_ = phone_hub_manager;  // ----&gt;[1]<!----></span><br>  if (phone_hub_manager_) {<span class="line"><!---->  if (phone_hub_manager_) {<!----></span><br>    phone_hub_manager_->GetFeatureStatusProvider()->AddObserver(this);<span class="line"><!---->    phone_hub_manager_-&gt;GetFeatureStatusProvider()-&gt;AddObserver(this);<!----></span><br>    phone_hub_manager_->GetOnboardingUiTracker()->AddObserver(this);<span class="line"><!---->    phone_hub_manager_-&gt;GetOnboardingUiTracker()-&gt;AddObserver(this);<!----></span><br>    phone_hub_manager_->GetPhoneModel()->AddObserver(this);<span class="line"><!---->    phone_hub_manager_-&gt;GetPhoneModel()-&gt;AddObserver(this);<!----></span><br>  }<span class="line"><!---->  }<!----></span><br><br>  UpdateUiState(GetUiStateFromPhoneHubManager());<span class="line"><!---->  UpdateUiState(GetUiStateFromPhoneHubManager());<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>void PhoneHubUiController::CleanUpPhoneHubManager() {<span class="line"><!---->void PhoneHubUiController::CleanUpPhoneHubManager() {<!----></span><br>  if (!phone_hub_manager_)<span class="line"><!---->  if (!phone_hub_manager_)<!----></span><br>    return;<span class="line"><!---->    return;<!----></span><br><br>  phone_hub_manager_->GetFeatureStatusProvider()->RemoveObserver(this); //---->[2]<span class="line"><!---->  phone_hub_manager_-&gt;GetFeatureStatusProvider()-&gt;RemoveObserver(this); //----&gt;[2]<!----></span><br>  phone_hub_manager_->GetOnboardingUiTracker()->RemoveObserver(this);<span class="line"><!---->  phone_hub_manager_-&gt;GetOnboardingUiTracker()-&gt;RemoveObserver(this);<!----></span><br>  phone_hub_manager_->GetPhoneModel()->RemoveObserver(this);<span class="line"><!---->  phone_hub_manager_-&gt;GetPhoneModel()-&gt;RemoveObserver(this);<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br>[0] <span class="line"><!---->[0] <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/ui/webui/chromeos/multidevice_internals/multidevice_internals_phone_hub_handler.cc;l=360;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/ui/webui/chromeos/multidevice_internals/multidevice_internals_phone_hub_handler.cc;l=360;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/ui/webui/chromeos/multidevice_internals/multidevice_internals_phone_hub_handler.cc;l=360;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4<!----></a><br>[1] <span class="line"><!---->[1] <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/system/phonehub/phone_hub_ui_controller.cc;l=92;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/system/phonehub/phone_hub_ui_controller.cc;l=92;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/system/phonehub/phone_hub_ui_controller.cc;l=92;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4<!----></a><br>[2] <span class="line"><!---->[2] <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/system/phonehub/phone_hub_ui_controller.cc;l=337;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/system/phonehub/phone_hub_ui_controller.cc;l=337;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:ash/system/phonehub/phone_hub_ui_controller.cc;l=337;drc=169c6cc102b39295a5bfe2f2a176b42b1c2fe2c4<!----></a><br><br>## Patch<span class="line"><!---->## Patch<!----></span><br>The patch for this vulnerability is trivial, just convert DCHECK to CHECK<span class="line"><!---->The patch for this vulnerability is trivial, just convert DCHECK to CHECK<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br> void MultidevicePhoneHubHandler::EnableFakePhoneHubManager() {<span class="line"><!----> void MultidevicePhoneHubHandler::EnableFakePhoneHubManager() {<!----></span><br>-  DCHECK(!fake_phone_hub_manager_);<span class="line"><!---->-  DCHECK(!fake_phone_hub_manager_);<!----></span><br>+  CHECK(!fake_phone_hub_manager_);<span class="line"><!---->+  CHECK(!fake_phone_hub_manager_);<!----></span><br>   PA_LOG(VERBOSE) << "Setting fake Phone Hub Manager";<span class="line"><!---->   PA_LOG(VERBOSE) &lt;&lt; "Setting fake Phone Hub Manager";<!----></span><br>   fake_phone_hub_manager_ = std::make_unique<phonehub::FakePhoneHubManager>();<span class="line"><!---->   fake_phone_hub_manager_ = std::make_unique&lt;phonehub::FakePhoneHubManager&gt;();<!----></span><br>   ash::SystemTray::Get()->SetPhoneHubManager(fake_phone_hub_manager_.get());<span class="line"><!---->   ash::SystemTray::Get()-&gt;SetPhoneHubManager(fake_phone_hub_manager_.get());<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users.             Target project:<label for="targetProjectInput">Target project:</label>
            
              <input id="targetProjectInput" aria-owns="chops-autocomplete-1" aria-autocomplete="both" aria-expanded="false" aria-haspopup="listbox" aria-activedescendant="">
              
      
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;
        }

            <label for="targetProjectInput">Target project:</label>
            <div>
              <input id="targetProjectInput" aria-owns="chops-autocomplete-1" aria-autocomplete="both" aria-expanded="false" aria-haspopup="listbox" aria-activedescendant="">
              <mr-autocomplete vocabularyname="project" for="targetProjectInput" role="listbox" id="chops-autocomplete-1"><!---->
      <style>
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;
        }
      </style>
      <div class="chops-autocomplete-container">
        <span class="screenreader-hidden" aria-live="polite">
          
        </span>
        <table hidden="">
          <tbody>
            
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>
    <!----></mr-autocomplete>
            </div>
          </div>

      <style>
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;

              Discard
            <chops-button class="de-emphasized discard-button">
              Discard
            </chops-button>
            
      
        <slot></slot>
      <button disabled="">

runOnLoad(function() {
 // CrDX Feedback Button
 (function(i,s,o,g,r,a,m){i['CrDXObject']=r;i[r]=i[r]||function(){
 (i[r].q=i[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},a=s.createElement(o),

 runOnLoad(function() {
 if (typeof(ClientLogger) === "function") {
 let cl = new ClientLogger("issues");
 if (cl.started("new-issue")) {
 cl.logEnd("new-issue", null, 120 * 1000);
 }
 if (cl.started("issue-search")) {
 cl.logEnd("issue-search");
 }
 }
 });
<script type="text/javascript" nonce="">
 runOnLoad(function() {
 if (typeof(ClientLogger) === "function") {
 let cl = new ClientLogger("issues");
 if (cl.started("new-issue")) {
 cl.logEnd("new-issue", null, 120 * 1000);
 }
 if (cl.started("issue-search")) {
 cl.logEnd("issue-search");
 }
 }
 });
</script>
